questions.question: Checklist step 1: What is the graph about?
questions.no_answer_feedback: Please select an answer. The graph refers to the percentage of an average income that is received as a minimum wage.

mc_options.text: Minimum cost of living in four different countries
mc_options.feedback: Incorrect. The graph refers to the percentage of an average income that is received as a minimum wage.

mc_options.text: Amount of wages received in four different countries
mc_options.feedback: Incorrect. The graph refers to the percentage of an average income that is received as a minimum wage.

mc_options.text: The percentage of an average income that is received as a minimum wage
mc_options.feedback: Correct! The graph refers to the percentage of an average income that is received as a minimum wage.

mc_options.text: The number of workers on minimum wages
mc_options.feedback: Incorrect. The graph refers to the percentage of an average income that is received as a minimum wage.

mc_options.text: Percentage of wages spent in four different countries
mc_options.feedback: Incorrect. The graph refers to the percentage of an average income that is received as a minimum wage.

questions.options:
Minimum cost of living in four different countries
Amount of wages received in four different countries
The percentage of an average income that is received as a minimum wage
The number of workers on minimum wages
Percentage of wages spent in four different countries

questions.question: Checklist step 4: Is a specific time given?
questions.no_answer_feedback: Please select an answer. A specific time is given in the horizontal axis (1940 – 2000).

mc_options.text: No
